results.text: "Kuma inã karanta Alƙur'ãni." To, wanda ya shiryu, yã shiryu ne dõmin kansa kawai. Kuma wanda ya ɓãce, to, ka ce: "Ni daga mãsu gargaɗi kawai nake."
Kuma ka ce: "Gõdiya ta tabbata ga Allah. Zai nũna muku ãyõyinSa, har ku sansu." Kuma Ubangijinka bai zama Mai shagala daga barin abin da kuke aikatãwa ba.
